page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER WEST FLEGG
page.content: The Police uniform today is a blue shirt, tie, jacket and trousers, they wear a flat cap for casual work and a helmet for when they are on the beat. The cars they use have changed rapidly because cars used for crime have got faster. Crime doubles when the holiday makers come. The most common crime is cars being stolen but there is also criminal damage.In our area we have got one policewoman and four policemen. The police don't go round on the beat in our area,they patrol the area using cars.In our area the accident Black Spot is on the corner going to Gibbet Hill because it is a very sharp bend and people speeding crash very easily.Our rural area has a very low crime rate compared with cities.
